feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for emailing all contacts by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10489
  • Minor fix for settings prop check by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10491
  • react_release.yml improvements by @benbrummer in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10475
  • Fixes for unicode characters in html by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10492

New Contributors

  • @benbrummer made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10475

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.14...v5.11.15

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for react build pipe
  • Fixes for tests
  • v5.11.16 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10493

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.15...v5.11.16

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.17
New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for invoice terms display incorrectly
  • Fixes for Company Imports
  • Fixes for BCC not sending on payment failures
  • Clean up for HTML purifier
  • Static analysis clean
  • auth.net Customer import fixes
  • v5.11.18 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10504

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.17...v5.11.18

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for QR codes not appearing on PDF
  • Revert Nordigen PR

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.18...v5.11.19
